title: Missing Necklace
story: Mrs. Johnson, a wealthy socialite, discovered that her priceless necklace had gone missing. She immediately reported the incident to the police, who launched an investigation.
Detective Grant was assigned to the case and began interviewing the individuals present at Mrs. Johnson's glamorous charity event the night before the disappearance.
The detective had three main suspects in mind - the butler, the maid, and one of the guests. Each one had an alibi, but Detective Grant was determined to find the truth.

suspect.name: Butler
suspect.alibi: The butler claimed to have been serving guests in the dining room during the time of the incident.
suspect.confirmation: However, no one specifically remembered seeing the butler there.

witness.name: Maid
witness.observation: The maid said she saw a shadowy figure near Mrs. Johnson's room around the time of the incident.
witness.description: She described the figure as tall and wearing dark clothing.

npcs.name: Guest 1
npcs.dialogue: I have seen the necklace before. It's stunning, but I had no reason to take it.

npcs.name: Guest 2
npcs.dialogue: I noticed the library door was slightly ajar during the event.

clues.Front Door: The front door appeared to be locked and undisturbed.
clues.Library Door: The library door had been left slightly open, as mentioned by one of the guests.
clues.Kitchen Door: The kitchen door had a broken lock, but there were no signs of forced entry.
clues.Lobby: The lobby was crowded during the event, making it difficult to determine any suspicious activity.
